-&Psu vA# yajatra | 
yEnAqntari#kSha-muqrvA#taqtantha# tvEqShaH sa BAqnura#rNaqvO nRuqcakShA$H || 
puqrIqShyA#sO aqgnaya#H prAvaqNEBi#H saqjOSha#saH | 
juqShantA(gm)# haqvyamAhu#tamanamIqvA iShO# maqhIH || 
iDA#magnE puruqda(gm) sa(gm)# saqniM gOH Sa#Svattaqma(gm) hava#mAnAya sAdha | 
syAnna#H sUqnustana#yO viqjAvA&gnEq sA tE# sumaqtirBU$tvaqsmE || 
aqyaM tEq yOni#r. RuqtviyOq yatO# jAqtO arO#cathAH | 
taM jAqna - [  ] 16
